DESCRIPTION: Knives are the Servant's most dedicated weapons. Can be thrown or converted into #ySatellites.
Temporal cards cost 0 and have #yEthereal and #yExhaust.
Blighted creatures take additional damage when attacked.
Shift effects can only be triggered by manually discarding the card.
Predict the enemy intent for the next turn. If correct, trigger the effect(s) at the start of your next turn.
Whenever you lose HP, lose Protection instead.
Elegance improves #yBlock and #yProtection gained from cards.
Reduces Attack damage taken by #b50% once.
When you play an Attack or are attacked, throw #b1 Satellite at the target/attacker for #b4 damage.
